segments.text: Excuse me . How much for one are these ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Say I was to buy four , could I get a discount ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I could offer you maybe 10 percent off .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I was hoping to get one free . Like four for 75 dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This one I'd better chat with the manager . Could you give me a second ?
segments.speaker: S2
